groups.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos
groups.description: Configuration properties for Nacos MCP integration.

groups.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.registry
groups.description: Configuration properties for Nacos MCP server registration.

groups.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.dynamic
groups.description: Configuration properties for Nacos MCP dynamic service discovery.

groups.name: spring.ai.nacos.prompt.template
groups.description: Configuration properties for Nacos prompt template integration.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.server-addr
properties.description: Nacos server address.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.namespace
properties.description: Nacos namespace for MCP service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.username
properties.description: Nacos username to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.password
properties.description: Nacos password to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.access-key
properties.description: Nacos access key to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.secret-key
properties.description: Nacos secret key to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.endpoint
properties.description: Nacos server endpoint.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.registry.enabled
properties.description: Whether to register MCP server service to Nacos.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.registry.service-name
properties.description: Service name for MCP server service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.registry.service-group
properties.description: Group for MCP server service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.registry.sse-export-context-path
properties.description: Base context path for SSE MCP server.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.dynamic.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable dynamic discovery of MCP server info from Nacos.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.dynamic.service-group
properties.description: Service group for dynamic discovery of MCP servers.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.nacos.dynamic.service-names
properties.description: Service names for dynamic discovery of MCP servers.

properties.name: spring.ai.mcp.server.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable MCP server.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.server.max-connections
properties.description: Maximum number of HTTP connections for the MCP server.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.server.acquire-timeout
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds for acquiring a connection.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.server.max-idle-time
properties.description: Maximum idle time in seconds for connections.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.server.max-life-time
properties.description: Maximum lifetime in seconds for connections.

properties.name: spring.ai.nacos.prompt.template.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Nacos prompt template support.
